entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 p.m. CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow in open areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
